title: Can someone identify this one or suggest a similar font?
author: dsbm223

comments.content:
The letters shown could be from any of several fonts, with the letters squeezed together, including Century Gothic

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317092905im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CenturyGothicAsHammock_3633.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/century-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317092905/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/century-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/century-gothic/")  
Don
Thanks donshottype for accurate suggestion. Really helpful.
